item.description: Come join us again for a great cause and a fun night of dancing with our friends..."THE WORLD PREMIER BAND" and the fabulous Djs from Speaks Entertainment. Each year we collect and donate non-perishable items for "The St.Joseph's food pantry". Last year over 350 people at...tended and brought... thousands of dollars worth of food for those in need!! This years party is again being held at "The Sons of Italy"...where it began over 20 years ago! Last year tickets sold out prior to the party so purchases in advance would be advised. (Pay Pal ) will be available.So get there early(doors open at 7:30pm),and enjoy some Hot & Cold Apps..then we'll get the party started with the best dance band around! This year we also have the downstairs function room with another full bar and Dj playing music all night! Tickets:$20.00 (Proper dress) Hot & Cold Apps / Coffee & Dessert Call me at 781-492-5349 or781-963-2691 for tickets
item.name: Lets dance the night away for a good cause...The Annual food drive dance party
